attributes.title: this app killed my hamster 😡
attributes.review: so i downloaded this app a while back, and it’s super lagging and there’s spam. however, whenever the app would crash, my hamster would have a seizure. eventually, i decided it was time to delete the app. just as i deleted it, my hamster dropped dead!!!! you had my vote donald, but now i hope no one votes for you because you possessed and killed my hamster 😡😡

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: It keeps crashing after 3 minutes of use, and it keeps logging me out. Very disappointed

attributes.title: What a load of crap😡
attributes.review: Takes up tremendous space and occupies phone a lot storage. Wouldn’t recommend wasting time downloading the app unless you seek a headache and low storage!

attributes.title: orange ✨trash✨
attributes.review: 👁👄👁 ➖👄➖ 👁👄👁 WHAT IN THE WORLD EVEN IS THIS APP! why should we let this homophobic racist pedo run out country! newaysss this boy is tryna ban tik tok and ooo am i mad abt this😾😾 banning tiktok wont stop gen z from making this country great just watch orange lookin oompa loompa🙄 neways you tried with this app🧚🏿‍♂️🤩💞✨NEVER TRY AGAIN🥴✨❤️🥺

attributes.title: ✨So horrible ✨
attributes.review: It was SOO hard to navigate and I didn’t know how to use the app. And I keep seeing trump nudes on it, it was so weird and disgusting, I had to delete it. Don’t download if you don’t want to see nudes. 🍊🍊🍊✨✨✨

attributes.title: So sad 😤
attributes.review: I was so happy that I found this app so I can support my orange racist pedophilic king🤴✨🍊but as soon as I downloaded it the app deleted itself 😢 it gave me a notification that he doesn’t want any beaners supporting him 😖😭😭😭😭🤧

attributes.title: Constantly Crashing!
attributes.review: This app literally DOES NOT WORK! How am I supposed to get my daily Trump news of the app doesn’t work?! It would be such a shame if the app was taken off of the App Store ☹️

attributes.title: confusing, dishonest, run by a rapist
attributes.review: I got the app as a trump supporter and i was very let down. it was a racist claiming he wasn’t such but there is evidence he is. i don’t want anyone to be misinformed please apple take this down.

attributes.title: The worst glitches a lot
attributes.review: Worst ever glitches out stole all my info just over all a bad app and I mean look at the rating obviously it’s bad so I don’t know why I got it.🤣 (I do be her from the tik tok tho)hehe
